text: Sean Malone (April 12, 1970 â€“ December 7, 2020) was an American musician. He played mainly fretless bass guitar and Chapman Stick. However, Malone also played piano, keyboards, and guitar. His most famous for his work was in American band Cynic, in which he developed a strong partnership with the drummer Sean Reinert. On 9 December 2020, it was announced that Malone had died. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:1970 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American heavy metal musicians Category:American pianists Category:American bass guitarists Category:American jazz musicians Category:American keyboardists Category:Musicians from New Jersey
title: Sean Malone
